content: crocheted circles belt © martina taborsky materials - yarn schachenmayr catania 100% cotton 125 m/ 50 g col 162 kaffe 210 rotbraun 179 kamel - crochet plastic rings prym - diameter 36 mm 18 pcs - metal belt buckle prym - crochet hook size d/3mm abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet = double_crochet double_crochet - in british slip_stitch slip_stitch instructions join yarn with a loop to ring yo and pull through work 40 single_crochet around ring slip_stitch to first single_crochet end off crochet 6 rings in col 162 6 rings in col 210 and 6 rings in col 179 connect rings decrease from the ws with a whipstitch using a strand of yarn and yarn needle or crochet rings decrease with slip_stitch attach yarn with 12 slip_stitch to one side of belt buckle connect decrease with first ring attach yarn with 12 slip_stitch to other side of belt buckle connect decrease with the last ring weave in all loose ends with yarn needle belt with ribbon materials - yarn lang opal lamé 77% rayon 15% polyamid 8% polyester 125 m/50 g 1/2 ball - plastic crochet rings prym - diameter 36 mm 20 pcs - 10 mm wide ribbon - crochet hook size d/3mm abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet = double_crochet double_crochet - in british slip_stitch slip_stitch instruction join yarn with a loop to ring yo and pull through work 40 single_crochet around ring slip_stitch to first single_crochet end off crochet all 20 rings connect rings decrease from the ws with a whipstitch using a strand of yarn and yarn needle or crochet rings decrease with slip_stitch cut 2 strands of ribbon and sew on each end of belt weave in all loose ends with yarn needle in the same way we can make a necklace when we use plastic rings with smaller diameter
